content.text:
# The Revolution and the French Establishments in India

The Revolution and the French Establishments in India (1790 - 1793) (2019) is a historical book edited by Indian writer Arghya Bose and co-translated by Arghya Bose and Sandhia Vasseur. It recounts the tumultuous events that closely followed in the French colonies of Pondicherry, Chandannagar, Mah√©, Karaikal, and Yanaon after the French Revolution in metropolitan France.
